meanings.definition: A plot of ground in which flowers are grown.
meanings.sent1: The colorful flowers in the flowerbed brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: She carefully tended to the flowerbed in her backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the flowerbed was a cozy place for a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a flowerbed in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the flowers in the flowerbed filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A bed of soil in which flowers are planted.
meanings.sent1: The gardener prepared the flowerbed for planting new flowers.
meanings.sent2: The flowerbed was filled with tulips and daisies.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the freshly dug flowerbed to be a perfect spot for rolling around.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him grew in her heart like flowers in a well-tended flowerbed.
meanings.sent5: The rainwater soaked into the flowerbed, nourishing the roots of the plants.
